name: Black Pepper
properties: Part of Daily Dozen herbs and spices
benefits: Black pepper contains piperine, which has anti-inflammatory properties and significantly enhances the bioavailability of curcumin in turmeric (up to 2000%). It adds flavor to dishes without adding calories and supports nutrient absorption.
amount: To taste, typically 1/4 teaspoon or ground to taste

quotes: Ground black pepper - add to taste in soups and dishes
1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper - adds flavor and enhances nutrient absorption
